name: Driving Game - 10 Seconds
description:
(Play in FULL Screen for BETTER EXPERIENCE)

This is a ‘Car Driving’ game based on Ludum Dare 51 theme (Every 10 seconds).

There is an amazing and beautiful city environment in which player can drive a car.

Every 10 seconds, there will be environmental and gameplay changes and player will have to play the game accordingly.

HOW TO PLAY!

Use Arrow Keys to Drive the car... Have FUNN!! ;)

Feedback Form: (Please take a minute to give us your feedback/suggestions)

https://forms.office.com/e/YDPkiAGNDi
